maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Spheromancer Lea! Congratulations on passing the final trial.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Сферомант Лея! Поздравляю с прохождением последнего испытания.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: HOW?!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: КАК?!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Do you wonder I got first despite your \c[1]clear advantage of dealing bugged damage\c[0]?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Тебе интересно, как я пришёл первым несмотря на твоё \c[1]явное преимущество за счёт сломанного урона\c[0]?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Well, that's something only a \c[1]seasoned Spheromancer\c[0] can understand!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ну, это то, что может понять лишь \c[1]опытный сферомант\c[0]!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Лея!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And as expected, both Spheromancers passed first!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Как и ожидалось, оба сфероманта пришли первыми!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Spheromancer Lea, what a coincidence! It looks like we both just passed the final trial!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Сферомант Лея, какое совпадение! Похоже, мы оба только что прошли последнее испытание!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Лея!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Phew! That was quite troublesome!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Фух! Это было довольно проблематично!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: All that sword fighting is hard to handle for a mage class.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Все эти бои на мечах трудно выдержать классом мага.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh! I see Apollo is here as well?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: О! Я вижу, что и Аполло здесь?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh! Lea... and Apollo?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: О! Лея... и Аполло?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Did you two just finish the quest as well?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Вы двое тоже только что закончили квест?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Pretty much, Hexacast!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Похоже на то, гексакаст!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Nice! I just barely managed.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Отлично! Я едва справился.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: You know...\. a mage versus a samurai...\. you can imagine how that goes.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Знаете...\. маг против самурая...\. можете представить, каково это.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Phew, that guy sure was fast.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Фух, этот парень, конечно, быстро двигается.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Polly! You're here, too? And here I thought you finished that quest already.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Полли! Ты тоже здесь? А я думал, что ты уже закончил этот квест.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh, more company appeared.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: О, появилась ещё компания.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Hello!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Привет!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Привет!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea! You're here as well?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Лея! Ты тоже здесь?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: We just keep running into each other...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Мы продолжаем натыкаться друг на друга...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Ah I see. You've been doing that quest with Lea, Polly?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: А, я вижу. Ты проходил этот квест с Леей, Полли?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Uhm... I thought you were busy today?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Эм... Я думал, что ты был занят сегодня?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Bug...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Жук...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Bug...\.\. Samurai....
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Жук...\.\. Самурай....

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Bug...\.\. Samurai...\.\. Boss...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Жук...\.\. Самурай...\.\. Босс...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Or...\. was he just a Samurai?\. I'm not sure...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Или...\. он просто самурай?\. Я не уверена...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Maybe his armor just made him kinda... look like a bug?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Может быть, его броня просто сделала его немного... похожим на жука?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Well, actually...\. traditional samurai armor is already bug-inspired,\. so...\.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ну, на самом деле...\. традиционные самурайские доспехи вдохновлены жуками,\. так что...\.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Shut up, nerd.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Заткнись, зануда.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Wait, what's everyone doing here?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Стоп, что вы все делаете здесь?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Did we all just pass this quest at the same time?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Или мы только что все прошли этот квест одновременно?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Looks like it!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Похоже на то!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Talk about coincidence!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Вот так совпадение!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oh well...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ну ладно...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That certainly was the worst quest ever!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Это безусловно был худший квест!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And it's DONE!\. Done and over with!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: И он ЗАКОНЧЕН!\. Закончен и всё на этом!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Congratulations, Pentafist!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Поздравляем, пентафист!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Now, the time has come to collect our reward!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Теперь, пришло время получить наше вознаграждение!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oui, oui. Let's go!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui, oui (Да-да). Погнали!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Uhm...\. did we just...\. complete the game?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Эмм...\. мы только что...\. завершили игру?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Sort of.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Вроде того.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: We completed the track and now can enter \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Мы завершили Путь и теперь можем войти на \c[3]Площадь Ромба\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: It means we reached the \c[3]end game\c[0]!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Это означает, что мы достигли \c[3]конца игры\c[0]!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Wha...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Чег...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: I was expecting another dungeon!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Я ожидала ещё одно подземелье!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Yes... and Instatainment is working on it, apparently.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Да... и Instatainment работает над ним, по всей видимости.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: People are hoping for an update that will complete the Track.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Люди надеются на обновление, которое будет завершать Путь.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: So... you're telling me CrossWorlds is still in \c[3]early access\c[0]?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Так... ты говоришь мне, что CrossWorlds по-прежнему в \c[3]раннем доступе\c[0]?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Mon dieu...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Mon dieu (Боже мой)...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Complete gaming experiences really have become rare these days.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Полноценный игровой опыт и в самом деле стал редкостью в наши дни.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: You know, at least it's all coherent with the lore.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Знаете, по крайней мере, это всё связано с историей игры.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Humankind simply has yet to unlock the final part of the track.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Человечеству просто ещё предстоит разблокировать финальную часть Пути.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And it will happen if enough Seekers run the track.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: И это произойдет, если на Пути будет достаточно Искателей.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oui, oui.\. That's very convenient.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui, oui (Да-да).\. Это очень удобно.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Wait...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Подожди...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Lea, that means Grand Krys'kajo was pretty much our last dungeon race, non?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Лея, это значит, что Гранд Крис'кайо был нашей последней гонкой в подземельях, так ведь?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: So not counting that tutorial dungeon, we had 5 runs in total.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Таким образом, не считая этого учебного подземелья, у нас было в общей сложности пять забегов.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And the final score of Lea versus Emilie is...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: И конечный результат Леи против Эмили...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: \v[plot.race.leaWins] to \v[plot.race.emilieWins].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: \v[plot.race.leaWins] к \v[plot.race.emilieWins].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Man, you really had the upper hand, didn't you?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Мда, ты действительно взяла верх, не так ли?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: And here I thought I'd have a chance after I won the tutorial dungeon.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: А я уж думала, что у меня будет шанс, после того, как победила в обучающем подземелье.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: \v[plot.race.leaWins] to \v[plot.race.emilieWins].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: \v[plot.race.leaWins] к \v[plot.race.emilieWins].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Oui, oui! Pentafists are known for speed, non?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Oui, oui (Да-да)! Пентафисты известны своей скоростью, разве нет?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Still, you've been an honorable opponent, Lea!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Но всё-таки, ты достойный противник, Лея!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: \v[plot.race.leaWins] to \v[plot.race.emilieWins].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: \v[plot.race.leaWins] к \v[plot.race.emilieWins].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That's surprisingly balanced, non?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: На удивление сбалансированно, не так ли?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Well... it certainly was a lot of fun to do those races!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Что ж... проводить эти гонки определённо было очень весело!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Let's continue once new dungeons are added!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Давай продолжим, как только будут добавлены новые подземелья!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: So... anyone want to check out Rhombus Square?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Так... кто-нибудь хочет посетить Площадь Ромба?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Sure, why not! Where do we have to go?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Конечно, почему нет! Куда нам надо идти?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Back to \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0], then take the \c[3]south exit\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Назад в \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0], а затем на \c[3]южный выход\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Très bien!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Très bien (Прекрасно)!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: I honestly just want to get out of this bug infested place, so I'll go ahead!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Честно говоря, я просто хочу выбраться из этого кишащего жуками места, так что я пойду вперёд!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Let's meet at CrossCentral!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Давайте встретимся в CrossCentral!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Sounds like a plan.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Звучит как план.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Alright!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Хорошо!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: We did it, Lea! We got the last Shade!
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Мы сделали это, Лея! Мы получили последнюю Тень!

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That means we can also access the northern part of \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Это означает, что мы можем получить доступ к северной части \c[3]Сапфирового края\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Hopefully, we will find the place in your dreams somewhere in that area.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Надеюсь, что мы найдём место из твоих снов где-то в этой области.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: After all, we are running out of options.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: В конце концов, у нас заканчиваются варианты.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Of course... if you like, you can join the others and explore Rhombus Square first.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Конечно... если хочешь, можешь присоединиться к остальным и исследовать Площадь Ромба.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Finding Satoshi's hideout can wait a little bit longer.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Обнаружение укрытия Сатоши может немного подождать.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Join the others to explore \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0] or search the north of \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Присоединитесь к другим, чтобы исследовать \c[3]Площадь Ромба\c[0], или исследуйте северную часть \c[3]Сапфирового края\c[0].

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: This...\. is nice.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Это...\. здорово.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: No heights to be afraid of, huh?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Нет высоты, которой нужно бояться, да?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Yes...\. I needed this...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Да...\. Я нуждалась в этом...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: That last tree dungeon was...\. the literal pinnacle.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Это последнее подземелье-дерево было...\. в буквальном смысле верхом моего страха.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: No new lore this time, huh?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Никакого продолжения истории игры, да?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Nope, not yet at least...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Неа, по крайней мере, пока...

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: You think they're ever gonna add more?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Думаешь, они когда-нибудь добавят ещё?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: I'm like\.\.\. 80% sure they're gonna add more with the next big update.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Я примерно на\.\.\. 80% уверена, что они добавят продолжение со следующим большим обновлением.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: What's the ETA on it?
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Когда там оно должно выйти?

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: TBA.
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Ожидает анонса.

maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.orig: Figures...
maps/forest/interior/statue-room.json/en.text: Понятно...
